text: @realDonaldTrump How about you go work on a Covid-19 unit loaded with patients struggling to breathe or are on ventilators & when I say work, I really mean work, not sit on a toilet tweeting or watching TV all day. Show some damn leadership, shut the hell up & take advice from experts.
